Fast-Food Clone

CHICK-FIL-A EGG WHITE GRILL COPYCAT

Our version of the famous Chick-fil-A Egg White Grill with even MORE protein. 35g vs the original 25g, with a perfectly seasoned chicken patty.

35g
Protein
310
Calories
25m
Total Time
4
Yield

Nutrition per 1 sandwich

Carbs28g
Fat8g
Fiber3g
Sugar4g
Sodium580mg
DifficultyMedium

VS. CHICKFILA

Compared to the original Egg White Grill:

+40%
More Protein
25g → 35g
-0%
Fewer Calories
290 → 310
-28%
Less Sodium
810mg → 580mg

INGREDIENTS

  • 454g (1 lb) chicken breast, ground or finely minced
  • 5g smoked paprika
  • 3g garlic powder
  • 3g onion powder
  • 2g dried thyme
  • 5g salt
  • 2g black pepper
  • 1g cayenne pepper
  • 4 whole wheat English muffins
  • 480ml (2 cups) liquid egg whites
  • 4 slices American cheese

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Season Chicken

Mix ground chicken with all seasonings until well combined.

2

Form Patties

Divide into 4 equal portions and form into thin, round patties slightly larger than the English muffins (they'll shrink).

3

Cook Patties

Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Cook patties 4-5 minutes per side until internal temp reaches 165F.

4

Cook Egg Whites

In an egg ring or small pan, cook egg whites into round patties, about 120ml each.

5

Assemble

Toast muffins. Stack: bottom muffin, chicken patty, cheese, egg white patty, top muffin.
